answers.answer: Hi,How are you?  Do you still experience the symptoms that you mentioned? What other symptoms are present? Yeast infection may also be brought about by taking antibiotics, obesity and underlying medical conditions such as diabetes.  If this persists or recurs, it is best that you have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: I got a yeast infection 2 days after having sex with my boyfriend...my question is, is it possible i got the yeast infection from messing up my pH levels and not from him because i also gave him oral but i didnt get any problems with sore throat or yeast infection in the mouth....if you know anything about this please give advice!
title: Oral Yeast Infections???
